name: Penalty
text: §325-14  Penalty.  Any person violating this chapter, or any rule or regulation of the department of health relating thereto, shall be deemed guilty of a misdemeanor.  Except as herein otherwise provided the punishment therefor shall be the same as provided by section 321-18. [L 1911, c 118, §16; RL 1925, §953; RL 1935, §1113; am L 1943, c 43, §5(b)(2); RL 1945, §2342; RL 1955, §49-14; HRS §325-14]
